description: A date value in ISO 8601 date format.

http://schema.org/purchaseDate.description: The date the item e.g. vehicle was purchased by the current owner.

http://schema.org/dateVehicleFirstRegist.description: The date of the first registration of the vehicle with the respective public authorities.

http://schema.org/vehicleModelDate.description: The release date of a vehicle model (often used to differentiate versions of the same make and model).

http://schema.org/uploadDate.description: Date when this media object was uploaded to this site.

http://schema.org/productionDate.description: The date of production of the item, e.g. vehicle.

http://schema.org/endDate.description: The end date and time of the item (in ISO 8601 date format).

http://schema.org/scheduledPaymentDate.description: The date the invoice is scheduled to be paid.

http://schema.org/dateCreated.description: The date on which the CreativeWork was created or the item was added to a DataFeed.

http://schema.org/lastReviewed.description: Date on which the content on this web page was last reviewed for accuracy and/or completeness.

http://schema.org/commentTime.description: The time at which the UserComment was made.

http://schema.org/releaseDate.description: The release date of a product or product model. This can be used to distinguish the exact variant of a product.

http://schema.org/expires.description: Date the content expires and is no longer useful or available. Useful for videos.

http://schema.org/previousStartDate.description: Used in conjunction with eventStatus for rescheduled or cancelled events. This property contains the previously scheduled start date. For rescheduled events, the startDate property should be used for the newly scheduled start date. In the (rare) case of an event that has been postponed and rescheduled multiple times, this field may be repeated.

http://schema.org/dissolutionDate.description: The date that this organization was dissolved.

http://schema.org/validUntil.description: The date when the item is no longer valid.

http://schema.org/foundingDate.description: The date that this organization was founded.

http://schema.org/startDate.description: The start date and time of the item (in ISO 8601 date format).

http://schema.org/priceValidUntil.description: The date after which the price is no longer available.

http://schema.org/datePosted.description: Publication date for the job posting.

http://schema.org/guidelineDate.description: Date on which this guideline's recommendation was made.

http://schema.org/dateModified.description: The date on which the CreativeWork was most recently modified or when the item's entry was modified within a DataFeed.

title: Date
